mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(user_id, username, password, org_id, tenant_id, nickname, phone, avatar, email, biz_role_type, create_by, type, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{orgId}, #{tenantId}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, #{email}, #{bizRoleType}, #{createBy}, #{type}, #{description})
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where user_id = #{userId} and del_flag = 0
mapper.update: update sys_user set username=#{user.username}, phone=#{user.phone}, org_id=#{user.orgId}, update_by=#{user.updateBy}, update_time=#{user.updateTime} where user_id = #{user.userId}

select user_id from sys_user s where s.del_flag = 0 and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and ( s.username like concat(#{name}, '%') or s.nickname like concat(#{name}, '%') )

select u.* from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join sys_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id)
and r.role_code = #{roleCode}

WITH RECURSIVE org_hierarchy AS ( SELECT org_id, org_name, parent_id FROM sys_org WHERE org_id = #{query.orgId} UNION ALL SELECT o.org_id, o.org_name, o.parent_id FROM sys_org o INNER JOIN org_hierarchy oh ON o.parent_id = oh.org_id ) SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.status, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.nickname, u.phone, u.avatar, u.email, u.create_time, u.update_time FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN org_hierarchy o ON u.org_id = o.org_id
and u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.username}, '%')
and u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.nickname}, '%')
AND u.del_flag = 0 order by u.create_time desc
